hero.headline: Headache relief, engineered.
hero.subheadline: Targeted compression for migraines, tension, cluster, and sinus-related headaches.

items.title: Universal Fit
items.text: Adjustable frame fits most head sizes comfortably.

items.title: Targeted Pads
items.text: Slide pads to frontal, temporal, or cervical pain points.

items.title: Tension Control
items.text: Twist to dial pressure up or down.
